name: Shrooman's Happy Day
description:
Help Shrooman get to the goal point at the top!

Dodge the vile Shroomobs and navigate past the devious fading platforms to reach the goal!

If you make it you will be rewarded with a gold star! If you're lucky, you can get all ten! If you fall to the bottom or the Shroomobs get you, you'll loose a star!

If you want to leave the game please press the Q button on your keyboard.

Please tell me what you think and how many stars you managed to achieve in the comments section below!

The song is the Underwater Theme from the SNES' Super Mario World and was composed by Koji Kondo. So all rights belong to them.
